page.title: 02Housing - a general view
page.content:
The area is still{mainly rural with {housing estates}at Les Fourneaux, Mont-es-Croix and Clos Orange. The housing consists of the original Jersey granite farm houses, cottages, modern bungalows, and estates of separate and semi-detached dwellings.
The{housing is largely privately owned and most people on the newer estate of Clos Orange are buying their homes with housing loans (special mortgages) from the States of Jersey. The area also has homes which come into the{luxury home category}and an example of which will be described in another part of the script.
